consistent-reason.value: I took 3 measurements because 3 measurements balances needs: the need to repeat analyses at one location on the one hand and the need to cover ground on the other hand.  In a real study, there isn't time and money to take many samples at many places, so you have to balance those two needs.

evenly-space-reason.value: Even spacing allows one to cover ground while not biasing your results to one particular location.

familiarity.value: I am not familiar with any features
